message.content:
1. Psychostimulants are considered first-line pharmacotherapy for youth with ADHD.
2. There are questions regarding the comparative efficacy of amphetamine- and methylphenidate-based agents.
3. Amphetamine- and methylphenidate-based agents are used in the treatment of ADHD.
4. The comparative efficacy of amphetamine- and methylphenidate-based agents is not definitively known.

messages.content:
Statement: Psychostimulants are considered first-line pharmacotherapy for youth with attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), but questions remain regarding the comparative efficacy of amphetamine- and methylphenidate-based agents.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
